body.p: Who are the individuals described by this data?

multiple_choice.choice: 19 million adults who experience depression each year

response.feedback: Incorrect. There are 19 million Americans who experience depression each year. However, this is not the specific data contained in this dataset.
Incorrect. Hospitals are a variable contained in the dataset.
Correct. The dataset contains information on 109 clinically depressed people who were part of the NIH study.
